person.persName: William B. Eversole (Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer and captain )

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Lewis Eversole in Clay County, Kentucky, on December 15, 1856. Father of Abijah Eversole, Abner Eversole, Anderson Eversole, and Martha Eversole. Farmer in Owsley County in 1860. Captain in the 14th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from February 13, 1863, to March 24, 1864.
